summary: Retextures of the Ring of Hircine
descriptionHtml:
A simple retexture of Frostmoon rings to Hircine Ring by MadMansGun. Instead of coloring the whole ring, only the eyes are colored. A personal mod uploaded by request!

All credit to MadMansGun for the original: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31434/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31434/[/url]

Installation:
USE ONE OR THE OTHER. You do not need both. You no longer need the original.

For the Left Hand Rings Modified version, you will need to follow the instructions here to see the rings in first person view: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/185764/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/185764/?[/url]
They use slot number 56.

Version 1.1:
Very minor fix, probably won't even notice it.
Added Left Hand Rings Modified version, requires Left Hand Rings Modified for the meshes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58491/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58491/[/url]
(It will work fine with the original Left Rings: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21720]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21720[/url] However, it uses the slot from Left Hand Rings Modified)

Version 1.0:
Release
author: Midnight Voyager

files.name: Hircine's Frostmoon Rings - Left Hand Rings Modified
files.changelogHtml:
Very minor fix, probably won't even notice it.
Added Left Hand Rings Modified version.
Now standalone due to minor fixes.
